snippet: German authorities in the southwestern town of Gaggenau evacuated the city hall on Friday after receiving a bomb threat, its mayor told German television, one day after he canceled an event where Turkey's justice minister was to speak....

headline.main: WBC Hands Povetkin Suspension, $250,000 Fine in Doping Case
headline.print_headline: WBC Hands Povetkin Suspension, $250,000 Fine in Doping Case

lead_paragraph: German authorities in the southwestern town of Gaggenau evacuated the city hall on Friday after receiving a bomb threat, its mayor told German television, one day after he canceled an event where Turkey's justice minister was to speak.
